page.title: 03A walk through the grid II
page.content: Past the farm there was the Manor Arms to our right and a few cottages to the left. We then passed under the Southampton to Bournemouth Railway and came to the Christchurch By-pass. There was a small cross at the junction and a footbridge. Directly ahead lay Somerford and a Large housing estate. We skirted the estate to the right and arrived at Purewell Cross. Turning left into Somerford Road there was a small industrial was estate to our right. On our left was Somerford Ambulance Station and the Grange Comprehensive School. At the top of the road we passed two new superstores (A DIY store and a furniture and carpet store). We could also see the terminus for the no.20 yellow bus. Eventually we came to a large roundabout at the start of the bypass.
